Contact

Contact a specific employee.

  • Billy
  • Nathan

Array short-hand

If you don't want to overwrite a specific css files or you want to add more than 1 stylesheet without any id, you can use an array: 

		.state('root.demo.contact', {
			url: '/contact',
			templateUrl: 'views/demo/pages/contact.html',
			data: {
				css: ['styles/demo/pages/contact.css']
			}
		});
